reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Operation and development of the center of the industrial parties in Marib (Phase IV)

description.narrative: 1. Installing all kinds of prostheses. 2. Providing a career rehabilitation service before and after installing prostheses with physical rehabilitation, following them up and benefiting from them in community service. 3. Building capabilities for the medical and technical staff professionally and scientifically and raising its capabilities to deal with specific cases. 4. Reducing the migration of specialized medical and technical personnel.

1. The steadfastness of the medical and technical staff and the reduction of immigration for 37 Yemeni medical staff, with the resettlement of service in Marib Governorate. 2. Rehabilitation and training of 45 Yemeni trainees to work in the field of (manufacturing and installing prosthetics). 3. Manufacturing and installation of 300 new prostheses (lower-upper). 4. Providing a physical rehabilitation service for 700 injured people.

The project of operating and developing the center of artificial limbs in Marib aims to continue providing services for the production of prosthetics of all kinds and the physical and psychological rehabilitation of injured and injured Yemenis who have been subjected to amputations of their upper or lower limbs as a result of the spread of random mines, which contributes to opening the way for them to return to practice their normal lives as they were with enabling These services are available within the center by providing training programs for young Yemeni cadres in the fields of (manufacturing and installing prostheses / physical and psychological rehabilitation).

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
